slug.label: Slug
slug.desc: The slug is the URL-friendly version of the title. It is usually all lowercase and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
slug.article_already_exists: This article already exists. Please choose another slug.

delete.title: Delete Article
delete.desc: This action will permanently delete <title></title> article.

categories.title: Categories
categories.desc: Set up categories for your articles.

slug.label: Slug
slug.desc: The slug is the URL-friendly version of the name. It is usually all lowercase and contains only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
slug.category_already_exists: This category already exists. Please choose another slug.

delete.title: Delete Category
delete.desc: This action will permanently delete <name></name> category and all its articles.
